播.definition: (bound form) to sow (seeds); to spread (ideas, rumors etc); to broadcast (radio signals etc); Taiwan pr. [bo4]

播出.definition: to broadcast; to air (a TV program etc)

播弄.definition: to order people about; to stir up; to sow discord

播放.definition: to broadcast; to transmit (by radio or TV)

播映.definition: to broadcast a film; to televise

播種.definition: to grow (maize etc) from seed; to plant (maize etc) by sowing seed

播講.definition: to broadcast a lecture, a book reading etc

播送.definition: to broadcast; to transmit; to beam
